RAW.SOURCE:
` *&---------------------------------------------------------------------* *& Include YGPL_MT_CONDITIONS_MACROS *&---------------------------------------------------------------------*
DEFINE simple_compare. if &2 <> &3. message i016 with &1 &2 &3. endif. END-OF-DEFINITION. DEFINE complex_compare. if &2 <> &3. message i017 with &1. endif. END-OF-DEFINITION.
